name: Overthrowing the Network State with Coordi-Nations
description:
PRACTICE

9:30 - 11:00 Reporting on practical steps for setting up a Coordi-Nation: Practical Cookbook for creating a Coordi-Nation

11:00 - 12:30  Fishbowl: Ground up approach to multi-layer organizations: how do we stitch things together rather than pare down uniformity backed by serious capital ? (Sara H.)

14:00 - 17:00 Roundtables

  1. Comparing the Network State with Coordi-Nations; Mutualism versus Tribalism.
  2. Are these already proto-Coordi-Nations and how do we help them become full Coordi-Nations ?
